languages.text: {n}Сразу несколько бандитов разражаются гоготом. {/n}"Ух, как страшно!" {n}— выдыхает одноглазый сквозь слезы. Легким движением он достает из рукава спрятанный нож. Глейто у вашей ноги утробно рычит, и бандиты прекращают смеяться.{/n}

{n}Several bandits at once break into howling laughter.{/n} "Oh, that sure gave me a fright, it did," {n}says the leader through the tears, casually pulling a knife from his sleeve. Glaito, standing by your leg, lets out a rumbling growl, and the laughter stops.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Сразу несколько бандитов разражаются гоготом. {/n}"Ух, как страшно!" {n}— выдыхает одноглазый сквозь слезы. Легким движением он достает из рукава спрятанный нож. Глейто у вашей ноги утробно рычит, и бандиты прекращают смеяться.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Several bandits at once break into howling laughter.{/n} "Oh, I'm so scared!" {n}says the leader through the tears, casually pulling a knife out of his sleeve. Glaito, standing by your leg, lets out a rumbling growl, and the bandits stop laughing.{/n}

{n}Several bandits at once break into howling laughter.{/n} "Oh, I'm so scared!" {n}says the leader through the tears, casually pulling a knife out of his sleeve. Glaito, standing by your leg, lets out a rumbling growl, and the bandits stop laughing.{/n}

{n}Several bandits at once break into howling laughter.{/n} "Oh, I'm so scared, I'm shitting my britches!" {n}says the leader through the tears, casually pulling a knife from his sleeve. Glaito, standing by your leg, lets out a rumbling growl, and the laughter stops.{/n}

{n}Several bandits at once break into howling laughter.{/n} "Oh, I'm so scared, I'm shitting my britches!" {n}says the leader through the tears, casually pulling a knife from his sleeve. Glaito, standing by your leg, lets out a rumbling growl, and the laughter stops.{/n}

{n}Several bandits at once break into howling laughter.{/n} "Oh, that sure gave me a fright, it did," {n}says the leader through the tears, casually pulling a knife from his sleeve. Glaito, standing by your leg, lets out a rumbling growl, and the laughter stops.{/n}

{n}Several bandits at once break into howling laughter.{/n} "Oh, that sure gave me a fright, it did," {n}says the leader through the tears, casually pulling a knife from his sleeve. Glaito, standing by your leg, lets out a rumbling growl, and the laughter stops.{/n}

languages.text: {n}听到你的话，几个土匪放声大笑起来。{/n}“哎哟，你可真是吓死我了，真的。”{n}土匪头子笑出了眼泪，漫不经心地从袖子里抽出一把尖刀。格雷托站在你腿边，发出了低沉的咆哮，土匪的笑声也停了下来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several bandits at once break into howling laughter.{/n} "Oh, that sure gave me a fright, it did," {n}says the leader through the tears, casually pulling a knife from his sleeve. Glaito, standing by your leg, lets out a rumbling growl, and the laughter stops.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}听到你的话，几个土匪放声大笑起来。{/n}“哎哟，你可真是吓死我了，真的。”{n}土匪头子笑出了眼泪，漫不经心地从袖子里抽出一把尖刀。格雷托站在你腿边，发出了低沉的咆哮，土匪的笑声也停了下来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}何人もの盗賊が一斉に、吠えるように高笑いを始めた。{/n}「いやあ、まったく驚かされたよ」{n}涙をにじませながらリーダーは言い、何気なく袖からナイフを引き抜いた。足元に控えていたグライトが低く唸り声を上げると、笑い声はぴたりと止んだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several bandits at once break into howling laughter.{/n} "Oh, that sure gave me a fright, it did," {n}says the leader through the tears, casually pulling a knife from his sleeve. Glaito, standing by your leg, lets out a rumbling growl, and the laughter stops.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}何人もの盗賊が一斉に、吠えるように高笑いを始めた。{/n}「いやあ、まったく驚かされたよ」{n}涙をにじませながらリーダーは言い、何気なく袖からナイフを引き抜いた。足元に控えていたグライトが低く唸り声を上げると、笑い声はぴたりと止んだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Varios bandidos estallan simultáneamente en sonoras carcajadas.{/n} «Sí, estoy temblando de miedo», {n}dice el líder con lágrimas de risa en los ojos mientras se saca un cuchillo de la manga con gesto indiferente. Glaito, que espera a tu lado, suelta un gruñido gutural y las risas cesan en el acto.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several bandits at once break into howling laughter.{/n} "Oh, that sure gave me a fright, it did," {n}says the leader through the tears, casually pulling a knife from his sleeve. Glaito, standing by your leg, lets out a rumbling growl, and the laughter stops.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Varios bandidos estallan simultáneamente en sonoras carcajadas.{/n} «Sí, estoy temblando de miedo», {n}dice el líder con lágrimas de risa en los ojos mientras se saca un cuchillo de la manga con gesto indiferente. Glaito, que espera a tu lado, suelta un gruñido gutural y las risas cesan en el acto.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Birkaç haydut birden uluya uluya gülmeye başlıyor. Lider, gözyaşları içinde kol yeninden bıçağını çekiyor.{/n} "Ödüm koptu yeminle." {n}Bacağının dibinde duran Glaito'nun gür bir hırlama koyuvermesiyle gülüşler kesiliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several bandits at once break into howling laughter.{/n} "Oh, that sure gave me a fright, it did," {n}says the leader through the tears, casually pulling a knife from his sleeve. Glaito, standing by your leg, lets out a rumbling growl, and the laughter stops.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Birkaç haydut birden uluya uluya gülmeye başlıyor. Lider, gözyaşları içinde kol yeninden bıçağını çekiyor.{/n} "Ödüm koptu yeminle. {n}Bacağının dibinde duran Glaito'nun gür bir hırlama koyuvermesiyle gülüşler kesiliyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Plusieurs bandits éclatent simultanément d'un rire tonitruant.{/n} « Oh, ça m'a foutu une sacrée frousse, parole ! » {n}déclare le chef hilare avant de tirer un couteau de sa manche. Glaito, debout près de votre jambe, pousse un grognement menaçant qui fait immédiatement cesser les rires.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several bandits at once break into howling laughter.{/n} "Oh, that sure gave me a fright, it did," {n}says the leader through the tears, casually pulling a knife from his sleeve. Glaito, standing by your leg, lets out a rumbling growl, and the laughter stops.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Plusieurs bandits éclatent simultanément d'un rire tonitruant.{/n} « Oh, ça m'a foutu une sacrée frousse, parole ! » {n}déclare le chef hilare avant de tirer un couteau de sa manche. Glaito, debout près de votre jambe, pousse un grognement menaçant qui fait immédiatement cesser les rires.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Einige Banditen brechen in heulendes Gelächter aus.{/n} "Oh, jetzt hab ich aber Angst", {n}zischt der Anführer und zieht beiläufig ein Messer aus seinem Ärmel. Als Glaito neben dir ein bedrohliches Knurren ausstößt, verstummt das Gelächter.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several bandits at once break into howling laughter.{/n} "Oh, that sure gave me a fright, it did," {n}says the leader through the tears, casually pulling a knife from his sleeve. Glaito, standing by your leg, lets out a rumbling growl, and the laughter stops.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Einige Banditen brechen in heulendes Gelächter aus.{/n} "Oh, jetzt hab ich aber Angst", {n}zischt der Anführer und zieht beiläufig ein Messer aus seinem Ärmel. Als Glaito neben dir ein bedrohliches Knurren ausstößt, verstummt das Gelächter.{/n}
